title: every time i login the client scans all the files and takes aboutan hour to play
body:
Hi

 Thanks for reading.  I log in to league and it says an update is neccessary, which takes a few minutes, then when i am in the play button is 0percent and scanning files.  I also get the message we had to revert you back to an older version of league and will reinstate you to the new version which takes a further hour.  

what can i do to just play the game?  i dont want to delete the game but i guess that is the next choice. suppose my playstation will fill my days from now on....

Thanks

replies.body: Since your client is having problems getting patched up to the latest update, possibly due to some file getting corrupted during the download, let's try a relatively easy fix before you jump to uninstalling/reinstalling. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the force repatch option turned on. Let me know if that smooths things out for you!
